content:
About Me Hello there, I’m Luminal. Welcome to my personal blog where I talk about many things, mainly Game Development and my hobbies.
Mainly, you’ll see the ups and downs of my experiences and we might have a laugh here and there, mostly at the expense of my pain and suffering.
Little bit about me: I’m currently (on paper, at least) studying Computer Science as my degree. I’ve been in the game development scene for little over 2 years, mostly working with Godot and custom engines like Robust Toolbox.
Hope you enjoy your time here.
Contact Github: https://github.com/Lumminal Email: luminaldev44@proton.me
summary: Hello there, I’m Luminal. Welcome to my personal blog where I talk about many things, mainly Game Development and my hobbies.
title: about
